summary: Atmospheric Transmissivty corresponding to Remote Sensing Systems (RSS) Resampled brightness temperature
keywords: EARTH SCIENCE > ATMOSHERE > ATMOSPHERIC RADIATION > TRANSMITTANCE
title: Downelling Radiance computed from ERA5 profile on a 0.25 degree Earth grid, time interpolated to satellite overpass time
history: Created from ERA5 data downloaded from the Copernicus Climate Data Store using the RSS radiative transfer model
